headline.main: Kerry to Press Beijing to Halt Projects in South China Sea
headline.print_headline: Kerry to Press Beijing to Halt Projects in South China Sea

docs.snippet: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry is in China to press Beijing to halt increasingly assertive actions it is taking in the South China Sea....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry is in China to press Beijing to halt increasingly assertive actions it is taking in the South China Sea.

headline.main: American Pharoah Favored to Win Preakness, Set Up Triple Try
headline.print_headline: American Pharoah Favored to Win Preakness, Set Up Triple Try

docs.snippet: American Pharoah won the Kentucky Derby, yet didn't look unbeatable, as he had in his previous races. His trainer says he struggled. His jockey went to the whip about 30 times to urge him on in the stretch. His owner says the Derby wasn't even clo...
docs.lead_paragraph: American Pharoah won the Kentucky Derby, yet didn't look unbeatable, as he had in his previous races. His trainer says he struggled. His jockey went to the whip about 30 times to urge him on in the stretch. His owner says the Derby wasn't even close to his best effort.

headline.main: Washington 'Peeping Tom' Rabbi Gets Six-And-a-Half Years in Prison
headline.print_headline: Washington 'Peeping Tom' Rabbi Gets Six-And-a-Half Years in Prison

docs.snippet: A prominent Washington rabbi who pleaded guilty to secretly videotaping dozens of women naked during ritual baths was sentenced to 6 1/2 years in prison on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A prominent Washington rabbi who pleaded guilty to secretly videotaping dozens of women naked during ritual baths was sentenced to 6 1/2 years in prison on Friday.

docs.snippet: Presidential candidate Marco Rubio didn't mention Jeb Bush or Hillary Rodham Clinton at the Georgia Republican Convention on Friday, but he said America has too many "outdated" leaders....

headline.main: Man Indicted in Ferguson Rally Shooting That Injured Police
headline.print_headline: Man Indicted in Ferguson Rally Shooting That Injured Police

headline.main: Tribe, School Board at Odds Over Putting Tribal Flag in Gym
headline.print_headline: Tribe, School Board at Odds Over Putting Tribal Flag in Gym

docs.snippet: Members of an Oregon tribe and a Willamette Valley school board are at odds over a request to hang a tribal flag in the school gymnasium along with state and national flags....
docs.lead_paragraph: Members of an Oregon tribe and a Willamette Valley school board are at odds over a request to hang a tribal flag in the school gymnasium along with state and national flags.

headline.main: Illegal migrants struggle to sneak across Greek land border
headline.sub: Illegal migrants struggle to sneak across Greek land border

docs.snippet: Illegal migrants trying to reach Europe attempt to sneak across the Greek border into Macedonia under the shadows of the forests, only to be repelled by Macedonian border guards and warning shots. Nathan Frandino reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Illegal migrants trying to reach Europe attempt to sneak across the Greek border into Macedonia under the shadows of the forests, only to be repelled by Macedonian border guards and warning shots. Nathan Frandino reports.

headline.main: U.S. House Republicans Push Two-Month Extension for Transport Projects
headline.print_headline: U.S. House Republicans Push Two-Month Extension for Transport Projects

docs.snippet: Republicans in the U.S. Congress, unable to reach agreement on a long-term transportation funding bill in time for a May 31 deadline, on Friday introduced legislation for a two-month extension to buy more negotiating time....
docs.lead_paragraph: Republicans in the U.S. Congress, unable to reach agreement on a long-term transportation funding bill in time for a May 31 deadline, on Friday introduced legislation for a two-month extension to buy more negotiating time.

headline.main: Buffett's Berkshire Adds to Favorites IBM, Wells Fargo
headline.print_headline: Buffett's Berkshire Adds to Favorites IBM, Wells Fargo

docs.snippet: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc on Friday said it has increased its holdings in some of its biggest stock investments, including Wells Fargo & Co and International Business Machines Corp....
docs.lead_paragraph: Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc on Friday said it has increased its holdings in some of its biggest stock investments, including Wells Fargo & Co and International Business Machines Corp.
